name: The Sheepening
description:
The sheep's pen has broken! The sheep are starting to run out around out of

control! Herd them back into the broken pen and prevent them from eating all
the flowers. Be warned they don't want to stay there and they're going to keep
inviting their friends to partake in the open fields. Watch out for that pesky
squirrel too!

This game was our first attempt at ever entering in a game jam. It's also our first attempt ever at really making a project in any video game engine after regularly tinkering for a few days every 6 months or so for the past 10+ years. It's not great, but it's our first attempt and we're proud of it! 

Credits:

Programming: Connor Trostel, Nick Bunting

Art: Connor Trostel, Nick Bunting

Music: Connor Trostel,Nick Bunting
